verses.roman:
rādhikāra prema--guru, āmi--śiṣya naṭa
sadā āmā nānā nṛtye nācāya udbhaṭa

synonyms: rādhikāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; prema—the love; guru—teacher; āmi—I; śiṣya—disciple; naṭa—dancer; sadā—always; āmā—Me; nānā—various; nṛtye—in dances; nācāya—causes to dance; udbhaṭa—novel.
translation: "The love of Rādhikā is My teacher, and I am Her dancing pupil. Her prema makes Me dance various novel dances."
